articles.author: Mark Thompson
articles.title: More Evidence for the Gravitational Wave Background of the Universe - Universe Today
articles.description: The gravitational wave background was first detected in 2016. It was announced following the release of the first data set from the European Pulsar Timing Array. A second set of data has just been released and, joined by the Indian Pulsar Timing Array, both s…
articles.content: The gravitational wave background was first detected in 2016. It was announced following the release of the first data set from the European Pulsar Timing Array. A second set of data has just been re… [+3308 chars]
